Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Joe Biden tweeted the statement mentioned.
Lack enough support: There is no evidence or support provided to verify the existence of the tweet.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Joe Biden made a controversial statement about white people, which is not supported by any credible source.
Exaggerate: The claim may be seen as an exaggeration since it attributes a divisive and inflammatory statement to Joe Biden without any evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: It is possible that the tweet was fabricated or created by someone else impersonating Joe Biden.
